sentences.english: Then Jacob had to run away from home to live within his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 雅各只好逃离自己的家，到舅舅家去住。

sentences.english: Then Master Linton has forgot the first injunction of his uncle,' I observed: `he bid us keep on the Grange land, and here we are off at once.'
sentences.chinese: 那么林惇少爷已经忘了他舅舅的第一道禁令了。

sentences.english: We stayed in my uncle’s every time we went to the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 我们每次到乡下玩都是住在舅舅家。

sentences.english: She met Uncle Dalton when she was working as a deaner at the bus station.
sentences.chinese: 她是在公共汽车站作清洁工时遇到多尔顿舅舅的。

sentences.english: Uncle Lin Wei is the only family, uncle will stay around.
sentences.chinese: 林薇是舅舅的唯一亲人，舅舅将其留在身边。

sentences.english: Uncle Lin Wei is the only family, uncle will stay around.
sentences.chinese: 林薇是舅舅的唯一亲人，舅舅将其留在身边。

sentences.english: My uncle tinkered about in the kitchen.
With a letter to write, he decided not to call at Uncle's .
sentences.chinese: 因为有信要写，他决定不去舅舅家了。

sentences.english: Being a gastronome, my uncle is well acquainted with the best restaurants in the city.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个美食者，我舅舅知道这个城市最好的餐馆。

sentences.english: The uncle nodded his head with great satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 舅舅十分满意地点点头。

sentences.english: Walter was going to speak, but his Uncle held up his hand.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔特想要讲话，但是他的舅舅举起了手。

sentences.english: On Saturday morning I reminded my uncle that I wished to go to the bazaar in the evening. He was fussing at the hallstand, looking for the hat-brush, and answered me curtly
sentences.chinese: 星期六早上我提醒我舅舅，晚上我要去集市。

sentences.english: My uncle is never lavish of endearments.
sentences.chinese: 我舅舅从不过分表示亲热。

sentences.english: The kindness of my uncle and aunt can never be requited.
sentences.chinese: 舅舅和舅母的恩典今生今世也报不了。

sentences.english: Mr. Yamasaki became interested in architecture after his mother's brother came for a visit.
sentences.chinese: 山崎实在舅舅的一次来访之后开始对建筑产生兴趣。

sentences.english: Uncle Mike married twice, he has two stepsons.
sentences.chinese: Mike舅舅结过两次婚，他有2个继子。

definition: father's sister's husband/husband of paternal aunt/uncle
younger male cousin via female line
older male cousin via female line
mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
